Articles.Content: I am proposing we, the KSP community, send a series of manned missions to the Mun to determine the precise geology of multiple places across its surface. Using Munar maps, we would then make detailed pictures showing the composition of the Munar surface in as many areas as possible.

You'd have to use a little google fu, but there is a player that has made VERY detailed maps of the Mun's surface. He was working on all of the planets as well, and is probably done by now. I don't know it this will satisfy you but it's worth a look.

Doesn't need too much 'google-fu' to find:

http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Those maps really can't be beaten.
